caption.center: PERLE WARD, Respondent, v. JAMES WILSON RILEY, Appellant, and Others,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion for reargument denied, with ten dollars costs. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Motion for a stay denied.
opinion.panel: Present â€” Lazansky, P.J., Carswell, Davis and Johnston, JJ.; Close, J., not voting.
